comments:
Description: When click on label hyperlink, "Invalid Thread Access" error 
message appears.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label and edit its hyperlink.
2. Preview and click on this label.

Actual result: Error message apperas.
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2942)

en(PreviewEditor.java:336)

(OleEventTable.java:55)

For display thread don't allow to start a new Display(), use a new thread to 
support this.
